CreateChallenge.name: CreateChallenge
CreateChallenge.description: Grants permission to create a Challenge for a Connector

CreateConnector.name: CreateConnector
CreateConnector.description: Grants permission to create a SCEP Connector in your account

DeleteChallenge.name: DeleteChallenge
DeleteChallenge.description: Grants permission to delete a Challenge for a Connector

DeleteConnector.name: DeleteConnector
DeleteConnector.description: Grants permission to delete a SCEP Connector in your account

GetChallengeMetadata.name: GetChallengeMetadata
GetChallengeMetadata.description: Grants permission to get a Challenge for a Connector

GetChallengePassword.name: GetChallengePassword
GetChallengePassword.description: Grants permission to get a Challenge password for a Connector

GetConnector.name: GetConnector
GetConnector.description: Grants permission to get a SCEP Connector in your account

ListChallengeMetadata.name: ListChallengeMetadata
ListChallengeMetadata.description: Grants permission to list Challenges for a Connector

ListConnectors.name: ListConnectors
ListConnectors.description: Grants permission to list the SCEP Connectors in your account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a pca-connector-scep resource in your account

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a pca-connector-scep resource in your account

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a pca-connector-scep resource in your account
